octeon_dma_ops_t Struct Reference

#include <cavium_kernel_defs.h>

Detailed Description

Used by CNTQ module to register DMA queue interrupt handler, tasklets and statistics routines for each octeon device.

Definition at line 152 of file cavium_kernel_defs.h.

Data Fields
